reviewText: My dad thoroughly enjoyed watching this video.  He had been a hiker and was suffering from Parkinson's, but was able to vicariously live his hiking adventures again.

My wife and I enjoyed watching the beautiful Mount Rainier scenery.  The video quality was good.  The feature on Mount St. Helens was informative.  It was interesting seeing the mountain before and after the eruption.

Holiday is well known for great video presentations, and this video continues with that reputation.  Great scenic shots of landscapes, flowers, wildlife and scenery.  We use all their videos to screen through the sights of National Parks to plan our family vacations.
